alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 03 at 5:23PM MDT until June 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 523 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 9 miles southeast of Haswell, or 30 miles northwest of Lamar, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Sweetwater Reservoir and Neegronda Reservoir. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
